name: Cecelia FRANCIS, an Individual, Respondent v. C. Crady SWISHER, III, an Individual, Petitioner
docket_number: Petition No. 730 Western District Allocatur Docket 2000

parties: Cecelia FRANCIS, an Individual, Respondent v. C. Crady SWISHER, III, an Individual, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 20th day of June, 2001, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted on the following issue:
Is the trial court order denying Petitioner’s Petition for Relief from Default Judgment appealable as of right pursuant to Pa.R.A.P. 311(a)(1)?
Appeal to be submitted on briefs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
773 A.2d 143
Cecelia FRANCIS, an Individual, Respondent v. C. Crady SWISHER, III, an Individual, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 20, 2001.
